name: Angry Grandpa
description:
Grandpa is Angry. That stupid radio signal won´t stop playing a techno song and he can´t take it anymore!!

Help him use his jetpack chair and turn off the radio without running out of power! There is only one problem though... 

Grandma lost control and can´t stop throwing stuff att him in his way up too the radio. The good news is that she will throw a Battery once in a while...

Can he make it?

Movement/Controls
  • A or Left arrow = Left.
  • D or Right arrow = Right.
  • W or Up arrow = Up.
  • S or Down arrow = Down.
  • Esc = Pause

Pick up Batteries to refuel!!

Credits Programmers
  • Chivano Van Rijsdam
  • Luis Gomez Vecchio 
Artists

  • Joni K
  • Noortje Schuur
